Investigator: Wait To See If Michael Vick Has Changed ESPN.com- The man who led the U.S. government's investigation of Michael Vick 's dogfighting case said that he's withholding judgment on the quarterback's rehabilitation. Do I think he's changed? I don't know, said retired U.S. Department of Agriculture senior special agent Jim Knorr, speaking to ESPN's Outside The Lines. "I would hope he has but I don't know.
